#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int n,i;
	double a,f;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	char s[n+1];
	scanf("%s",s);
	scanf("%lf%lf",&a,&f);
	int cmax=0;
	for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
	{
	int c=1;
	while(s[i]==s[i+1])
	{
		c++;
		i++;
	}
	if(c>cmax)
	cmax=c;
	}
	if(a>=f)
	printf("NO\n");
	else
	{
	if(cmax*a<f)
	printf("YES\n");
	else
	printf("NO\n");
    }
	return 0;
}
